code: import React from'react';import{Popover,TextField,Button}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotePopover=_ref=>{let{anchorPosition,open,onClose,colors,highlightColor,setHighlightColor,comment,setComment,onSave}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Popover,{open:open,anchorReference:"anchorPosition",anchorPosition:anchorPosition,onClose:onClose,anchorOrigin:{vertical:'bottom',horizontal:'center'},transformOrigin:{vertical:'top',horizontal:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'10px',marginBottom:'10px'},children:colors.map((color,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>setHighlightColor(color),style:{width:'20px',height:'20px',backgroundColor:color,border:color===highlightColor?'2px solid black':'',cursor:'pointer'}},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Comment",fullWidth:true,multiline:true,rows:2,value:comment,onChange:e=>setComment(e.target.value),style:{marginBottom:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onSave,disabled:!comment,color:"primary",variant:"contained",children:"Save"})]})});};export default NotePopover;
